Barrels can be used in several different scenarios.

Uses[edit | edit source]

A barrel is used during some quests:

  • During the Regicide quest as a component in making a bomb needed to destroy Tyras camp.
  • During the Mourning's End Part I quest, a barrel is used on a Rotten Apple Pile to get rotten apples.
  • In the Misthalin Mystery quest, a barrel filled with explosives is used to blast a hole in a wall.

[[File:Barrel detail.png|left|100px]]
'''Barrels''' can be used in several different scenarios.

==Uses==
A barrel is used during some quests:
*During the [[Regicide]] quest as a component in making a bomb needed to destroy Tyras camp.
*During the [[Mourning's End Part I]] quest, a barrel is used on a [[Rotten Apple Pile]] to get [[rotten apples]].
*In the [[Misthalin Mystery]] quest, a barrel filled with explosives is used to blast a hole in a wall.
